chapters.title: Chapter 29: A Cup of Sleep
chapters.info: Nesune Bihara, p. 558 (636)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She is one of the Aes Sedai now sworn to Rand; she assisted in his kidnapping. She always listens to all sides before drawing any conclusions, and she remembers everything. She is slender, has black eyes, and grew up in Kandor. Min had a viewing of her: she will found a library.
